description: Recursive DNS Servers discovery daemon is a userspace implementation of the RFC 5006 for Microsoft Windows
notes: sudo New-Service -Name rdnssd -BinaryPathName "$dir\rdnssd_win32.exe -b" -DisplayName "Recursive DNS Servers discovery daemon" -StartupType Manual -Description "IPv6 recursive DNS server discovery daemon is an implementation of the RFC 5006 for Microsoft Windows. It parses the RDNSS options present in Router Advertisement (RA), get the DNS nameservers and write them in the registry."
